## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{j6vlj4ea}
ciphertext: 0x242044a7a7d670114f11e7ab0427144d3281b1a5e70683702a233b9182806f15c7d3f3850e8c0d63166b0e5e9c884cca8eeb91f2fbbf9c8824e51addf82af8ad
cipher: RSA Low-Exponent Signature
hint: What happens when you cube small numbers? Remember e=3!
necessary_info: Public Key (n, e): (10591525668978296623927599023597588480151992914165095634028820006977685176581293895213227781776630542713571078361416397598575949134977332263020484773467717, 3)

archetype: signature_schemes
